organization_profile.goal: Enhance student engagement, reduce instructor workload, and improve query resolution with AI while maintaining data privacy.

recommendations: Refine GenAI model for complex question generation to reduce human review by 30%
Implement a data quality framework to improve the accuracy of personalized learning path recommendations.
Expand AI-powered chatbot capabilities to handle more complex student queries, potentially integrating voice support.

roles.name: Senior Data Scientist
roles.credentials: PhD/MS in Machine Learning, 5+ years experience in NLP/Education, AWS Certified

roles.name: NLP Engineer
roles.credentials: BS/MS in Computer Science/NLP, 3+ years experience in NLP model development, AWS experience

roles.name: Data Quality Analyst
roles.credentials: BS in Statistics/Data Science, 2+ years experience in data quality management, SQL proficiency

team_structure.existingteamstructure: Leverage the existing team of 5 data scientists/ML engineers.

risk_register.name: Data privacy violations
risk_register.mitigation: Regular audits and ensure strict adherence to the Indian data protection laws.

risk_register.name: Model accuracy and performance degradation
risk_register.mitigation: Implement continuous monitoring and retraining of the models.

risk_register.name: High costs for cloud-based services
risk_register.mitigation: Optimize resource allocation and usage of cloud services.

risk_register.name: Lack of skilled talent
risk_register.mitigation: Aggressive hiring and on-the-job training of existing staff

risk_register.name: Difficulty in model explainability and transparency
risk_register.mitigation: Use explainable AI tools and techniques

resistors.strategy: Training on AI usage, demonstration of workload reduction

training.plan: Weekly workshops for instructors, AI awareness sessions for students

tools: AWS SageMaker, AWS Comprehend, Data Quality tools
AWS Transcribe, custom model deployment pipelines

longtermstrategy.scaling_trigger: >15% increase in student engagement, 25% reduction in instructor workload
longtermstrategy.innovation_pipeline: Annual AI hackathons for new ideas, explore new AI-powered features
